div.script:
jQuery(document).ready(function() { var chartDiv = $("#barChart"); var myChart = new Chart(chartDiv, { type: 'pie', data: { labels: ["Uber", "Menulog", "Deliveroo", "DoorDash","Nothing Found"], datasets: [ {
data: [ 0,
0,
0,
0 ,
0],
backgroundColor: [ "#FF6384", "#4BC0C0", "#FFCE56", "#0000FF", "#000000", ] }] }, options: { title: { display: true, text: 'Tender Type' }, responsive: true, maintainAspectRatio: false, } }); });

jQuery(document).ready(function() { var chartDiv = $("#barChartChannelMix"); var myChart = new Chart(chartDiv, { type: 'pie', data: { labels: ["Uber", "Menulog", "Deliveroo", "DoorDash","DineIn","Takeaway","Nothing Found"], datasets: [ {
data: [ 0,
0,
0,
0 ,
0,
0,
0],
backgroundColor: [ "#FF6384", "#4BC0C0", "#FFCE56", "#0000FF", "#839942", "#0B636D", "#000000", ] }] }, options: { title: { display: true, text: 'Channels' }, responsive: true, maintainAspectRatio: false, } }); });
